mapper.insert: insert into hotel (no, hname, haddr, checkin, checkout, capacity, price, roomcapacity, roomtype, ldiv, bookedup) values (#{no}, #{hname}, #{haddr}, #{checkin}, #{checkout}, #{capacity}, #{price}, #{roomcapacity}, #{roomtype}, #{ldiv}, #{bookedup})
mapper.update: update hotel set hname=#{hname}, haddr=#{haddr}, checkin=#{checkin}, checkout=#{checkout}, capacity=#{capacity}, price=#{price}, roomcapacity=#{roomcapacity}, roomtype=#{roomtype}, ldiv=#{ldiv}, bookedup=#{bookedup} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from hotel order by no desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
